briefdescription.para: Get the node identifier for the PWM controller from a pwms property at an index.
Get the node identifier for the PWM controller from a pwms property by name.

detaileddescription.para: Example devicetree fragment: pwm1: pwm-controller@... { ... }; pwm2: pwm-controller... { ... };
n: node { pwms = <&pwm1 1 PWM_POLARITY_NORMAL>, <&pwm2 3 PWM_POLARITY_INVERTED>; pwm-names = "alpha", "beta"; };

Example usage: DT_PWMS_CTLR_BY_NAME(DT_NODELABEL(n), alpha) // DT_NODELABEL(pwm1) DT_PWMS_CTLR_BY_NAME(DT_NODELABEL(n), beta) // DT_NODELABEL(pwm2)
node_id
node identifier for a node with a pwms property
name
lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property
the node identifier for the PWM controller in the named element
DT_PHANDLE_BY_NAME()

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the node identifier for the PWM controller at index 0 in the node's "pwms" property

briefdescription.para: Get PWM specifier's cell value at an index.
Get a PWM specifier's cell value by name.

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the cell value at index 0

briefdescription.para: Get a PWM specifier's channel cell value at an index.

detaileddescription.para: This macro only works for PWM specifiers with cells named "channel". Refer to the node's binding to check if necessary.
This is equivalent to DT_PWMS_CELL_BY_IDX(node_id, idx, channel).

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the channel cell value at index "idx"

briefdescription.para: Get a PWM specifier's channel cell value by name.

detaileddescription.para: This macro only works for PWM specifiers with cells named "channel". Refer to the node's binding to check if necessary.
This is equivalent to DT_PWMS_CELL_BY_NAME(node_id, name, channel).

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property
lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the channel cell value in the specifier at the named element

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the channel cell value at index 0

briefdescription.para: Get PWM specifier's period cell value at an index.

detaileddescription.para: This macro only works for PWM specifiers with cells named "period". Refer to the node's binding to check if necessary.
This is equivalent to DT_PWMS_CELL_BY_IDX(node_id, idx, period).

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the period cell value at index "idx"

briefdescription.para: Get a PWM specifier's period cell value by name.

detaileddescription.para: This macro only works for PWM specifiers with cells named "period". Refer to the node's binding to check if necessary.
This is equivalent to DT_PWMS_CELL_BY_NAME(node_id, name, period).

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property
lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the period cell value in the specifier at the named element

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the period cell value at index 0

briefdescription.para: Get a PWM specifier's flags cell value at an index.

detaileddescription.para: This macro expects PWM specifiers with cells named "flags". If there is no "flags" cell in the PWM specifier, zero is returned. Refer to the node's binding to check specifier cell names if necessary.
This is equivalent to DT_PWMS_CELL_BY_IDX(node_id, idx, flags).

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the flags cell value at index "idx", or zero if there is none

briefdescription.para: Get a PWM specifier's flags cell value by name.

detaileddescription.para: This macro expects PWM specifiers with cells named "flags". If there is no "flags" cell in the PWM specifier, zero is returned. Refer to the node's binding to check specifier cell names if necessary.
This is equivalent to DT_PWMS_CELL_BY_NAME(node_id, name, flags) if there is a flags cell, but expands to zero if there is none.

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property
lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the flags cell value in the specifier at the named element, or zero if there is none

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a pwms property

simplesect.para: the flags cell value at index 0, or zero if there is none

briefdescription.para: Get the node identifier for the PWM controller from a DT_DRV_COMPAT instance's pwms property at an index.

simplesect.para: the node identifier for the PWM controller referenced at index "idx"

briefdescription.para: Get the node identifier for the PWM controller from a DT_DRV_COMPAT instance's pwms property by name.

parameterdescription.para: lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the node identifier for the PWM controller in the named element
the node identifier for the PWM controller at index 0 in the instance's "pwms" property

briefdescription.para: Get a DT_DRV_COMPAT instance's PWM specifier's cell value at an index.

simplesect.para: the cell value at index "idx"

briefdescription.para: Get a DT_DRV_COMPAT instance's PWM specifier's cell value by name.

parameterdescription.para: lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the cell value in the specifier at the named element
the cell value at index 0
the channel cell value at index "idx"

parameterdescription.para: lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the channel cell value in the specifier at the named element
the channel cell value at index 0
the period cell value at index "idx"

parameterdescription.para: lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the period cell value in the specifier at the named element
the period cell value at index 0
the flags cell value at index "idx", or zero if there is none

parameterdescription.para: lowercase-and-underscores name of a pwms element as defined by the node's pwm-names property

simplesect.para: the flags cell value in the specifier at the named element, or zero if there is none
the flags cell value at index 0, or zero if there is none
